results.title: UK Teens Jailed After $4.3M Wrench Attack Robbery Caught on Police Video
results.description: Police video shows Sheffield teens posing as delivery drivers to steal $4.3 million in crypto at knife point from a London flat owner.

results.title: Bitcoin Crashes Below $67K, Erasing All Gains Since Trump's Election Win
results.description: Bitcoin has fallen more than 9% on the day, cratering to a price not seen since before President Trump's 2024 election win.

results.title: Virginia Advances Bill in Committee to Establish State Bitcoin Fund
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Virginia Advances Bill in Committee to Establish State Bitcoin Fund Virginia lawmakers pushed forward a proposal that would allow state funds to be invested in bitcoin. This post Virginia Advances Bill in Committee to Establish State Bitcoin Fund first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin price may drop below $64K as veteran raises ‘campaign selling’ alarm
results.description: Bitcoin risks a deeper slide as miners and US spot ETFs cut BTC exposure, adding supply pressure during a fragile downtrend.

results.title: Multiliquid, Metalayer launch instant redemption backstop for RWAs on Solana
results.description: The new facility allows institutions to redeem tokenized real-world assets into stablecoins instantly, addressing a key liquidity bottleneck in onchain markets.

results.title: Morning Minute: Are Humans Ready to Work for Robots?
results.description: Crypto developers are leaning into a hot new jobs sector: AI agents that employ humans for IRL tasks.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Record $1M Lightning transfer tests Bitcoin payments for institutions
results.description: A $1 million Lightning transfer between SDM and Kraken was used to test whether Bitcoin’s main scaling layer could handle seven‑figure, institutional‑grade payments.

results.title: Bitcoin Price Crashes 9% to $69,000 As Markets Spiral Into Full Risk-Off Mode
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Price Crashes 9% to $69,000 As Markets Spiral Into Full Risk-Off Mode The bitcoin price crashed to $69,000 in trading Thursday as a deepening selloff in global markets spilled into crypto markets. This post Bitcoin Price Crashes 9% to $69,000 As Markets Spiral Into Full Risk-Off Mode first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Ro Khanna Launches Probe Into $500M UAE Deal With Trump-Linked World Liberty Financial
results.description: The lawmaker is formally seeking records on the UAE’s deal with WLFI amid conflict-of-interest and national security concerns.

results.title: SDM Executes First Ever $1 Million Lightning Network Payment to Kraken in Institutional Pilot
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine SDM Executes First Ever $1 Million Lightning Network Payment to Kraken in Institutional Pilot Secure Digital Markets and Kraken completed a $1 million Bitcoin pilot settlement over the Lightning Network—claimed as the largest publicly reported Lightning payment—demonstrating near-instant, low-fee institutional settlement. results.title: Trump-linked WLFI faces probe over $500M UAE crypto deal
results.description: House Democrats probe $500 million UAE investment in Trump-linked WLFI, highlighting questions over dealings with the country's national security adviser.

results.title: AI surveillance marks a new phase for South Korea’s crypto markets
results.description: Recent volatility reviews, new surveillance systems and a landmark court ruling show how South Korea is enforcing stricter oversight of crypto markets.

results.title: Vitalik Buterin sells $6.6M in ETH after flagging planned withdrawals
results.description: Vitalik Buterin sold almost 3,000 ETH worth $6.6 million through a series of swaps days after saying withdrawals from his holdings were coming.

results.title: Bhutan Transfers $22M in Bitcoin Amid Market Downturn
results.description: Analysts see routine treasury management as Bhutan moves Bitcoin to a market maker while the crypto trades 44% below its all-time high.

results.title: Bitcoin ETFs extend losses with $545M outflows as BTC nears $70K
results.description: Bitcoin ETFs saw $545 million in daily outflows as BTC neared $70,000, though analysts said most investors were holding positions despite market weakness.

results.title: Coinbase fends off Nevada’s emergency bid to halt prediction markets
results.description: A Nevada judge declined to grant regulators’ bid to halt Coinbase’s event contract markets, as the exchange presses a CFTC preemption argument in federal court.

results.title: Tether USDt hits record $187B market cap in Q4 despite crypto downturn
results.description: USDt added $12.4 billion in Q4 to reach a $187.3 billion market cap, increasing users and onchain activity even as rival stablecoins declined after October’s liquidation event.

results.title: UNICEF Calls on Governments to Criminalize AI-Generated Child Abuse Material
results.description: UNICEF has pressed governments to criminalize AI-generated child sexual abuse material, warning deepfakes are exposing children to serious harm beyond existing laws.

results.title: FCC Opens Review of Elon Musk's SpaceX Plan for Orbital AI Data Centers
results.description: The filing follows approval of Starlink’s Gen2 expansion and Elon Musk’s push to move AI infrastructure into orbit.

results.title: Bitcoin Extends Selloff as Macro Pressures and Leverage Unwind
results.description: The latest decline reflects a broader unwind in leverage, with investors reassessing Bitcoin’s short-term role as an inflation hedge.

results.title: Anthropic’s AI Tools Rattle Software Stocks, Prompt Rethink of Sector Valuations
results.description: A selloff in professional-services stocks followed fresh concerns that AI agents could disrupt traditional software pricing.

results.title: Brock Pierce's Relationship With Jeffrey Epstein Went Deeper Than Anyone Knew
results.description: Convicted child sex offender Jeffrey Epstein was involved in Tether co-founder Brock Pierce's love life, among other things.

results.title: Alleged Bitcoin Ransom Deepens Mystery in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Alleged Bitcoin Ransom Deepens Mystery in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance The search for 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie has escalated after TMZ reported receiving an alleged ransom note demanding millions in Bitcoin, complete with a deadline, threats of harm, and a verified wallet address. This post Alleged Bitcoin Ransom Deepens Mystery in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.
